def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, in get1idxs(idxs):
        check_x_pale = is_light(x, ctx) and not is_white(x, ctx)
        check_x_small = is_small(x, ctx)
        check_x_set_apart = all([get_distance(x, dot, ctx) > 1 for dot in idxs if dot != x])
        if (
            check_x_pale
            and check_x_small
            and check_x_set_apart
        ):
            results.append([x])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def select(state):
    # Select a dot.
    return state
state = select(state)
